meanings.sent1: The frowzy room was filled with scattered clothes and dust.
meanings.sent2: She didn't want to go out in her frowzy pajamas.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked at the frowzy mess with confusion.
meanings.sent4: The frowzy state of the kitchen made her cringe.
meanings.sent5: The frowzy smell in the room was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: The old books had a frowzy odor that lingered in the library.
meanings.sent2: The basement had a frowzy smell that made her cough.
meanings.sent3: The frowzy scent of the attic made her think of ancient secrets.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a frowzy atmosphere that sent shivers down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The frowzy aroma of the room was like stepping back in time.
